name: Lazer Defender_ReturnOfUdemy
description:
This is my second game called Lazer Defender_ROU, based on the Udemy Course on 2D games!

-all art is self made with Aesprite and sound is from freesound.org!
- you play with the arrow keys and shoot with the Ctrl button, have fun and you will see more prototypes of the kind as I finish my video game courses! >.<
-if you don't like my self made music, just mute it with the SpaceBar!
